**Example 1: 下载设备资源**



Input: 

```
tccli iotcloud DownloadDeviceResource --cli-unfold-argument  \
    --ProductID xxxx \
    --Name test \
    --DeviceName test
```

Output: 
```
{
    "Response": {
        "Url": "https://xxx.cos.ap-guangzhou.myqcloud.com",
        "RequestId": "69f65618-600b-4ac4-b8e3-4528a6819078"
    }
}
```
